fields.doc: Timestamp when the Kafka message was created.
fields.name: kafka_timestamp

fields.doc: Time when SAL created the message.
fields.name: sal_created

fields.doc: Time when SAL ingested the message.
fields.name: sal_ingested

fields.doc: The imageSequenceName as passed to the takeImages command
fields.name: imageSequenceName

fields.doc: The total  number of requested images in sequence
fields.name: imagesInSequence

fields.doc: The imageName for this specific exposure
fields.name: imageName

fields.doc: The zero based index number for this specific exposure within the sequence
fields.name: imageIndex

fields.doc: The effective time at which the image acquisition started (i.e. the end of the previous clear or readout)
fields.name: timeStamp
